CustomField.description: Sum of Close Amount on received Opportunities regardless of Currency Type. Grabs Opportunity.Close Amount for hard credited gifts and Partial Soft Credit.Amount for soft credited gifts. Excludes Planned Gifts. Calculated externally by the IT Data team and pushed into Salesforce nightly after qualifying changes
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The sum of Close Amount of all received Opportunities where the Account has a hard or soft credit (excludes Planned Gifts).
CustomField.label: Total Amount Committed Lifetime
